#How many times have I visited Babette's Kitchen?
```{r}

print("How many times have I visited Babette's Kitchen?")
length(c[grepl("BABETTE",c$Description),]$Description)

```

#How many times have I visited cafes (Babette's Kitchen and The Crafted Kup)?
```{r}
print("How many times have I visited cafes?")
tck<-length(c[grepl("THE CRAFTED KUP",c$Description),]$Description)
b<-length(c[grepl("BABETTE",c$Description),]$Description)

print(tck+b)
```


#How often have I visited cafes (Babette's Kitchen and The Crafted Kup)?
```{r}
d<-as.POSIXct((c[1,]$Posting.Date),format="%m/%d/%Y")-as.POSIXct((c[length(c$Description),]$Posting.Date),format="%m/%d/%Y")
dd<-as.numeric(d)/as.numeric(tck+b)
dd
```
